expo.name: LitterHero

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take pictures of litter.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to inform your city where to dispatch officials to.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses location to inform your city where to dispatch officials to.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses location to inform your city where to dispatch officials to.

expo.description: Cleaning your city, one picture at a time!
